column3: “Started medicating around 11:00 am this morning very good effects from this bud for my anxiety and for just clearing away negativity in the mind. This batch was in particular a purely indica strain and man does it do its job! Anxiety by about 2 pm gone and so is my paranoia from the ptsd, overall excellent experience highly recommend for those medical users looking for a good one hitter quitter indica that won't put ...”

“Me pareció que la cepa de White Dragon podría servir para el tratamiento de la migraña crónica. Hasta ahora me ha resultado bastante para aliviar los dolores y subirme el ánimo en la discapacidad implicada por el dolor.”
“Beautiful taste and smell, I can definitely confirm the earthy taste. Comparable to Super Silver Haze! 5/5”
“I thought ....I know... I'll write a killer review all about this kick ass weed ... But it kicked my ass to the point of not being able to write much at all lol”

“I give this strain a 4 out of 5, I've had this smoke for going on around 3 months. When I mix the pot ha pot" with other strains of Marijuana I've found coming back to the White Dragon the high  becomes more vivid and intense. This strain in regards to it's parent counterpart as an indica
column4: provides full relief one would expect from an indica. I've found for ME

column3: “very strong. extremely relaxing. a face numbing sorta high.”

“How’s this for a brand new strain?  With parentage like White Widow x Afghani this is truly a fabulous Indica dominate strain that has now just appeared here in Quebec  !

While the couch lock is not perhaps everyone’s favourite cup of mud this strain has surprised an often jaded cannabis market within the Province I do truly feel that this strain should have a home in everyone’s alternative pharmacy cabinet along wi...”

“Picked this up about a day ago very chunky buds, awesome kush smell just like its parent linage very very sticky and so many trichomes, think old school white widow on steroids. Will post later on with the actual effects of the strain”
“A true indica, the kind that cemets you to the ground.”
“Did nothing for me this strain grows tall and lanky buds are airy was nothing like the write up on it not one for my book but good luck if you decide to try a few 🙏”
“The smell is out of this world. The taste is right on it's heals. A fire strain that takes away the pain. It even helps me rhyme”

“Amazing night time strain. Pain leaves your body and a nice tingle in the areas that usually cause pain. Hard to stay focused on the movie I'm watching but when I do I get a sudden rush of more high. Then my eyes focus back. Definitely not an optimal daytime strain as I had to fight the high to stay awake.”
“very strong. extremely relaxing. a face numbing sorta high.”
“Great for my chronic lower back pain. Degenerative disc disease, 4 herniated discs.”
